chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), reduce Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> reduce Q p q

```coq
intros Q a b p q Hred.
generalize dependent a.
generalize dependent b.
generalize dependent p.
generalize dependent q.
induction Q as [|r Q IHQ]; intros;
  simpl in *;
  try solve [auto].
- simpl in Hred. inversion Hred. subst.
  apply reducetop with (a:=a) (b:=b) (nZb:=nZb) (p:=p) (q:=q) (r:=r); auto.
- apply IHQ with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q); auto.
  apply reduceskip with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q); auto.
  apply canonical_spminusf_full with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec); auto.
Qed.

original: intros Q a b p q Hred. generalize dependent a. generalize dependent b. generalize dependent p. generalize dependent q. induction Q as [|r Q IHQ]; intros; simpl in *; try solve [auto]. - simpl in Hred. inversion Hred. subst. apply reducetop with (a:=a) (b:=b) (nZb:=nZb) (p:=p) (q:=q) (r:=r); auto. - apply IHQ with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q); auto. apply reduceskip with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q); auto. apply canonical_spminusf_full with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec); auto.
